name: Tech Unlocked: GRAVITY
description:
You have just been voted into power by the entire planet, and by the power of modern technology, you have discovered "Gravity"! No longer do we swim to and from work, but walk! Without the tethers of non-gravity life to hold us down anymore we can achieve great things!

But wait! It looks like the rest of the universe has discovered gravity as well, and it is all attracted to you! Stop this unwarranted attraction by firing your space cannons and preventing these rocks from hitting our home!

How long can you survive? Can you turn a profit in this weird and whacky new universe?
